item.title: Trying Forestry from mobile browser
item.description: This is the first post using forestry I have actually setup git for android and other stuff for my blog this is another approach which can be used let see how’s this work. There would be more test post to check the overall working. Bbye Kudos Bhavesh Gupta

item.title: Bloging from mobile
item.description: This is the solution test for the question how to create static site generator blog from mobile with an ease this is a test post of everything works out a how to post is comming down soon. kudos, bye
